Rules Reminder

Please read and follow them to understand and use the site better.

Upload

Registered users can upload Video files only, up to 250Mb each.
Multiple file upload is not available (except on multiple browser tabs).

Random Pick-Up

3 random Videos among all uploaded are automatically displayed into the left sidebar, except yours and those you already downloaded.
You just have to refresh the page to see 3 other random ones.

Download

Users must upload at least the same Kb quantity they want to download.
You can see your "quota" at the top right of the page, once connected.

Content Moderation & Report

anyVIDz staff ensures privacy protection and unfiltered publication.
However to comply with laws, illegal posts such as underage stuff uploads are strictly prohibited.
Since anyVIDz staff cannot manually download and check all files one by one, a fork of open_nsfw is used to automatically detect and remove illicit content.
Hence like any other automated moderation system, this is not perfect and can miss out offensive content.
anyVIDz staff cannot be considered as responsible for any content uploaded by users until it has been reported.
Unfortunately, before being moderated, this kind of unwanted content can pop-up into the selection sidebar. Be aware of that.
If you want to report illegal or harmful content that the system missed out, please follow this guide below:

Expand


Please do not copy-paste preview or file ID into the support chat.
Indeed for security and operational matters, this kind of ID is temporary and randomly generated on-demand, and does not match with any recorded data set related to uploaded Video.
This is the reason why you must generate the MD5 hash of videos (and not the previews) you want to make erase, then send the hash list within the anyVIDz Support Chat.

For any inquiry, please use the support chat
